name: White Album 2: Shiawase no Mukougawa
storyline: Follow the story of Haruki Kitahara in his high school adventures made sweeter and at the same time complicated by the beautiful girls Setsuna Ogiso and Kazusa Touma that unexpectedly bump into his life and heart. Determine the game's ending by the choices made and experience weaving a unique ending to this complex and enthralling tale of budding young romance.
summary:
White Album 2: Shiawase no Mukougawa, a continuation:
From one of the most well known names in the eroge visual novel genre, Leaf presents its latest creation: White Album 2: Shiawase no Mukougawa. This adult visual novel is a direct sequel to the previous title White Album which had been impressively received by the public. Unlike other visual novels, this game entails a linear ending and offers pre-determined situations and focuses the charisma of its female characters.
